description: A contemporary koplo track blending modern pop elements with traditional Indonesian musical influences. The composition features rhythmic percussion, melodic guitar riffs, and ambient keyboard harmonies. The arrangement transitions between upbeat, dance-inducing sections and softer, introspective interludes, capturing a dynamic and emotive musical journey.
title: Untungnya Hidup Harus Terus Berjalan
name: untungnya_hidup_harus_terus_berjalan
